name: Jerus Jannick
Lore: 'Part of Amidala''s Royal Naboo Security Forces, Jerus has been trained as a protector of royalty, and is determined that his responsibility be carried out professionally.',
Text: 'Deploys - 2 to same site as Amidala. While in a battle with Amidala or Leia, your leaders present may not be targeted by weapons, and Jerus may be forfeited to satisfy all battle damage and attrition against you.',
